"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { Button } from "./ui/button" import { Input } from "./ui/input" import { ArrowLeft, MoreHorizontal, Search, Building2, Filter, Star, MapPin, DollarSign, Heart, Activity, Stethoscope, Plus, } from "lucide-react" export default function HospitalPage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("") const [showFilter, setShowFilter] = useState(false) const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ priceRange: "all", distance: "all", rating: "all", }) useEffect(() => { // Scroll to top when component mounts window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) const hospitals = [ { id: "1", name: "Apollo Hospitals", consultationFee: 750, distance: 2.5, rating: 4.8, specialty: "Multi-specialty", }, { id: "2", name: "Fortis Healthcare", consultationFee: 600, distance: 1.8, rating: 4.6, specialty: "Cardiology", }, { id: "3", name: "Max Healthcare", consultationFee: 800, distance: 3.2, rating: 4.7, specialty: "Oncology", }, { id: "4", name: "Manipal Hospitals", consultationFee: 550, distance: 1.2, rating: 4.5, specialty: "Neurology", }, { id: "5", name: "AIIMS", consultationFee: 200, distance: 5.0, rating: 4.9, specialty: "Government", }, { id: "6", name: "Medanta", consultationFee: 700, distance: 4.1, rating: 4.8, specialty: "Multi-specialty", }, { id: "7", name: "Narayana Health", consultationFee: 450, distance: 2.8, rating: 4.4, specialty: "Cardiac Surgery", }, { id: "8", name: "Columbia Asia", consultationFee: 500, distance: 1.5, rating: 4.3, specialty: "General Medicine", }, { id: "9", name: "Safdarjung Hospital", consultationFee: 250, distance: 6.2, rating: 4.2, specialty: "Government", }, { id: "10", name: "BLK Super Speciality", consultationFee: 650, distance: 3.8, rating: 4.6, specialty: "Super Speciality", }, ] const handleBack = () => { navigate("/home") } const handleFilterToggle = () => { setShowFilter(!showFilter) } const handleFilterChange = (filterType, value) => { setFilters((prev) => ({ ...prev, [filterType]: value, })) } const clearFilters = () => { setFilters({ priceRange: "all", distance: "all", rating: "all", }) } const filteredHospitals = hospitals.filter((hospital) => { const matchesSearch = hospital.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) const matchesPrice = filters.priceRange === "all" || (filters.priceRange === "budget" && hospital.consultationFee <= 300) || (filters.priceRange === "moderate" && hospital.consultationFee > 300 && hospital.consultationFee <= 600) || (filters.priceRange === "premium" && hospital.consultationFee > 600) const matchesDistance = filters.distance === "all" || (filters.distance === "near" && hospital.distance <= 2) || (filters.distance === "medium" && hospital.distance > 2 && hospital.distance <= 5) || (filters.distance === "far" && hospital.distance > 5) const matchesRating = filters.rating === "all" || (filters.rating === "high" && hospital.rating >= 4.5) || (filters.rating === "medium" && hospital.rating >= 4.0 && hospital.rating < 4.5) || (filters.rating === "low" && hospital.rating < 4.0) return matchesSearch && matchesPrice && matchesDistance && matchesRating }) const handleHospitalClick = (hospital) => { navigate(`/specialists/${hospital.id}`) } return (
{/* Enhanced Animated Bubble Background */}
{/* Floating Medical Icons */}
{/* Animated Gradient Bubble Orbs */}
{/* Enhanced Medical Header */}
{/* ECG Line Animation */}
{/* Medical Cross Pattern */}

BETSHOW

{/* Enhanced Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="h-14 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-sm border-2 border-white/50 rounded-xl text-gray-700 placeholder:text-gray-500 text-lg px-4 pr-12 transition-all duration-300 focus:border-teal-400 focus:shadow-lg focus:shadow-teal-100 hover:border-teal-300 hover:bg-white shadow-lg" />
{/* Enhanced Filter Section */}
{/* Enhanced Filter Dropdown */} {showFilter && (
{/* Medical-themed header */}

Medical Filters

{/* Price Filter with Medical Styling */}
{[ { value: "all", label: "All Prices", color: "text-gray-600" }, { value: "budget", label: "₹200 - ₹300", color: "text-green-600" }, { value: "moderate", label: "₹300 - ₹600", color: "text-blue-600" }, { value: "premium", label: "₹600 - ₹800", color: "text-purple-600" }, ].map((price) => ( ))}
{/* Distance Filter */}
{[ { value: "all", label: "All Distances", color: "text-gray-600" }, { value: "near", label: "< 2 km", color: "text-green-600" }, { value: "medium", label: "2-5 km", color: "text-yellow-600" }, { value: "far", label: "> 5 km", color: "text-red-600" }, ].map((distance) => ( ))}
{/* Rating Filter */}
{[ { value: "all", label: "All Ratings", color: "text-gray-600" }, { value: "high", label: "4.5+ ⭐", color: "text-green-600" }, { value: "medium", label: "4.0-4.4 ⭐", color: "text-yellow-600" }, { value: "low", label: "< 4.0 ⭐", color: "text-orange-600" }, ].map((rating) => ( ))}
)}
{filteredHospitals.length === 0 ? (
No hospitals found matching your criteria
) : ( filteredHospitals.map((hospital, index) => ( )) )}
